name: Cyberpunk Girls 2077
detailed_description:
Cyberpunk Girls 2077

Is a puzzle puzzle game. But unlike other games of this genre there are many innovations.

Game Features:

— There is a unique system of movement of the camera on the table.
— Special gallery with pictures.
— Each level is unique in its own way.
— Also in our game there is a pleasant sound that will completely relax you during the passage of levels.
— After completing the puzzle you will be able to see the picture you have collected in more detail!



In our game you will see a lot of beautiful girls and the number of updates will increase.

short_description: Welcome to the incredible world of Cyberpunk Girls 2077. Immersed in the game, you can find your new wife and forget about all the external problems.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 (8.1) / 10
  • Processor: 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 18 years old.
While there are hints and sex jokes in the game, there is no depiction of any sexual acts. Some characters wear mildly revealing clothes.
